body:
Hi again,


   Thank you so much. I got the file to be added finally. One question 
is that, after new types were added to supported surface types, then, 
when I select the glazing type, it exits as "Missing -."       I 
selected one clear glass layer (1) and another was from the glazing.dat 
which was just added. (My input data was the same as posted yesterday.)


Thank you so much for your help.
Siritip
